               throws IOException

getArtwork

public Bitmap getArtwork(Enums.ArtworkType type,
                         float x,
                         float y)
Fetch the poster for the video, scale it and store it as a Drawable in this.poster

Parameters:
x - desired width of poster in pixels
y - desired height of poster in pixels

getArtwork

public static Bitmap getArtwork(int id,
                                Enums.ArtworkType type,
                                float x,
                                float y,
                                String cover)
Fetch artwork for a video

Parameters:
id - id of video
type - type of artwork
x - desired width
y - desired height
cover - filename of coverfile, null if using services api
Returns:
Bitmap or null if it's not found
